What is variable shadowing in programming?

options.text: A variable that is defined within a function and is only accessible inside that function.
A situation where a variable declared in a local scope has the same name as a variable in a higher scope, effectively hiding the higher-level variable.
A variable that is accessible globally and can be used in any part of the program.
A variable that has not been initialized with a value.
